c1_nationality_quote: International students from all countries are eligible to apply.
c2_undergraduate_quote: This scholarship is for undergraduate/bachelor's degree students.
c3_tuition_quote: The scholarship covers full tuition fees.
c5_stipend_quote: A monthly stipend of $500 is provided for living expenses.
c6_stem_ee_quote: Open to all STEM fields including Electrical Engineering.
c7_deadline_quote: Application deadline: March 15, 2026 for Fall 2026 intake.
c8_sat_quote: SAT/ACT scores are not required for international applicants.
c9_ielts_toefl_quote: IELTS/TOEFL may be waived with a Medium of Instruction letter.
c10_not_embassy_quote: Apply directly through our online application portal.
